Ingredients.3: 1 salt and ground pepper to taste

Ingredients.6: 3 slices cooked bacon, cut into pieces

Ingredients.7: 0.5 cup diced tomatoes, or to taste (Optional)

Ingredients.8: 0.5 cup diced mushrooms, or to taste (Optional)

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).

Directions.2: Whisk eggs and milk together in a bowl; season with salt and pepper.

Directions.3: Spray a large skillet with cooking spray; heat over medium-high heat. Pour egg mixture into the skillet; cook and stir until eggs are set, about 5 minutes. Add sausage, bacon, tomatoes, and mushrooms, and cook until vegetables are soft, about 3 minutes.

Directions.4: Spread scrambled mixture over flatbread; top with shredded Monterey Jack cheese.

Directions.5: Bake flatbread pizza in the preheated oven until the cheese is bubbly and underside of the crust is golden brown, 5 to 7 minutes.
